publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3291 Malcolm Chisholm: The Food Protection (Emergency Prohibitions) (Amnesic Shellfish Poisoning) (West Coast) (No.9) (Scotland) Order 2002â€”That the Health and Community Care Committee, in consideration of The Food Protection (Emergency Prohibitions) (Amnesic Shellfish Poisoning) (West Coast) (No.9) (Scotland) Order, recommends that the order be approved. Supported by: Mr Frank McAveety*, Mrs Mary Mulligan*
